CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Deferred_Until__c, 'Q4 2017'),DATE(2017,10,01), IF(ISPICKVAL(Deferred_Until__c, 'Q1 2018'),DATE(2018,01,01), IF(ISPICKVAL(Deferred_Until__c, 'Q2 2018'),DATE(2018,04,01), IF(ISPICKVAL(Deferred_Until__c, 'Q3 2018'),DATE(2018,07,01), IF(ISPICKVAL(Deferred_Until__c, 'Q4 2018'),DATE(2018,10,01), IF(ISPICKVAL(Deferred_Until__c, 'Q1 2019'),DATE(2019,01,01), IF(ISPICKVAL(Deferred_Until__c, 'Q2 2019'),DATE(2019,04,01), IF(ISPICKVAL(Deferred_Until__c, 'Q3 2019'),DATE(2019,07,01), IF(ISPICKVAL(Deferred_Until__c, 'Q4 2019'),DATE(2019,10,01), IF(ISPICKVAL(Deferred_Until__c, 'Q1 2020'),DATE(2020,01,01), IF(ISPICKVAL(Deferred_Until__c, 'Q2 2020'),DATE(2020,04,01), IF(ISPICKVAL(Deferred_Until__c, 'Q3 2020'),DATE(2020,07,10), IF(ISPICKVAL(Deferred_Until__c, 'Q4 2020'),DATE(2020,10,01), null)))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Deferred Until Date
